subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: Lisby
full_text:
The point is what you make it, Steve. For me, it's the pure  
unadulterated joy is hearing them speak aloud instead of only  
clairaudiently in my mind. I can use my other Buddhist and  
metaphysical practices for self improvement. As for advancing the  
rest of the world, I'm not savior material, clearly, but if I can  
help at all, it will be in a small way that ripples--not a large and  
dramatic one. We're not going to enlighten humanity in a terrific  
burst of perfect EVP evidence, I don't think, no matter how many  
strictures we slap on box-derived evidence.

Ann
